Job Description:
- Assist the marketing manager and support the marketing team with marketing activities.
- Organize market research in order to develop Company.
- Design graphic materials (banner, brochure, menu, flyer, logo, leaflet, booklet, business card and …etc.)
- Deal with printing house providing with a strong quality control and reasonable price.
- Update regularly any statuses, photos, and videos in CASA entertainment Facebook page.
- Photograph any photos during special events.
- Provide support for marketing events and exhibitions as required.
- Assist with the collation of information for promotional literature.
- Coordinate the production of a wide range of marketing communications.
- Provide marketing tracking and research information by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data and trends.
- Prepare mails and proposal sent to clients, stakeholders and suppliers.
Job Requirement:
- Male/Female, 22-28 years old. 
- BBA in Marketing or Graphic Designer (IT) or other related fields. 
- At least 1 years experiences in Marketing and Graphic Designer with Event/ entertainment industry or other.
- Good command in English speaking, writing and listening. 
- Knowledge of Computer skill, Ms. Word, Excel and PowerPoint.
- Experienced in graphic designer (Adobe Photoshop, illustrator, Corel Draw, Photo Express... etc.)
- Good in Communication and interpersonal skill. 
- Very patience and good of coordination. 
- Be honest, good attitude, friendly and creative new ideas.
Company Profile: CASA Entertainment was establiish since 2007 in Cambodia.

Job Description:
• Coordinating with other departments (service, parts, and slaes) for new vehicles services 
• Checking vehicles readiness before delivery 
• Daily new vehicles movement arrangement within Company compus 
• Daily new vehicles stock updating and new vehicles key within company 
• Ensuring vehicles documents are correct before confirming for delivery 
• Monthly vehicles maintenance schedule arrangement with service section to ensure all vehicles readiness
• Reporting vehicles damage route cause to supervisor 
• Ensuring stock safety of accessories for vehicles stock delivery 
• Managing stock delivery with FIFO and reporting end month stock delivery to supervisor 
• Monthly vehicles stock report and accessories to accounting department 
• Performing other tasks as assigned by supervisor/manager
Job Requirement:
• Preferable Bachelor of Business Management or English Literature 
• At least 1 years experience in related admin or cross section communication 
• Honest, hardworking and initiative idea
• Able to work with less supervision 
• Good team player and good interpersonal skills
• Able to speak some English and some knowledge in Computer Skills
• Equipped with skills in Microsoft Office software i. e. word, Excel
• Proven ability to work with build and to maintain good relationship with other departments
• Holding valid driving license is preferable 

The successful candidate will be offered very challenging career opportunities, competitive remuneration and other benefits package. 

Interested candidates are requested to submit a Cover Letter and detailed CV stated position clearly with a current photo to the address below

*** Deadline: 15 March 2104
Company Profile: Toyota (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. is a sole exclusive distributor for all TOYOTA vehicles, Genuine Parts and Quality Service in the Kingdom of Cambodia. With the endless and massive support from our manufacturer, we have always taken into consideration regarding the right selection of suitable products into Cambodian market. To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.
